content.rendered:
Dear Friends,
Thanks to your generosity, on November 28th during the #GivingTuesday campaign, United Help Ukraine raised a total of $7,730.
In addition, we received the following note from Facebook about the matching of the donations:
“Thanks to the generosity of donors, Facebook and the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation are matching $670.00 in donations made to your nonprofit. The match payment will be paid through Network For Good by February 15, 2018.”
Thank you everyone who donated on that day!!!

Another good news is that on Wednesday following #GivingTuesday, Facebook announced that from now on it eliminates fees for donations made to nonprofits via Facebook. This means that 100% of your donations made to United Help Ukraine via Facebook will be used to specific causes to help Ukraine!

Your donations to United Help Ukraine are fully tax deductible under section 501(c)(3). If you are looking to support Ukrainian veterans or children who lost their homes to war, United Help Ukraine currently has five fundraisers dedicated to specific causes:

1) Car for Angel: https://www.facebook.com/donate/134822817141951/

2) Car for Serhiy: https://www.facebook.com/donate/931301223688856/

3) Christmas in the Carpathians for soldiers and families: https://www.facebook.com/donate/289089321581339/

4) Rehabilitation center “Point Zero”: https://www.facebook.com/donate/150663608998783/

5) Handcycle for Sasha C: https://www.facebook.com/donate/729264280602880/

You can read more here. Donations can be made via Facebook, PayPal (UnitedHelpUkraine@gmail.com), or by writing a check to United Help Ukraine.
